title: LangChain Basics
description: LangChain provides document loaders and text splitters for building LLM applications.

title: RAG Concept
description: Retrieval Augmented Generation combines external knowledge with language models.

title: PDF Loader
description: PyPDFLoader extracts text from PDF files page by page.

title: CSV Loader
description: CSVLoader converts spreadsheet rows into structured documents.

title: Text Splitter
description: Character and recursive splitters divide long text into smaller chunks.

title: Chunk Overlap
description: Overlap preserves context between adjacent text chunks.

title: Vector Search
description: Embeddings enable similarity search over document chunks.

title: Prompt Engineering
description: Well designed prompts improve answer quality and reliability.

title: Web Loader
description: WebBaseLoader fetches public website content for analysis.

title: Knowledge Assistant
description: A personal assistant answers questions from private documents.
